nodes.text: Life Day 2009 was a painting made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. The painting depicted several Wookiees circling around a tree with various decorations, as well as Darth Vader ominously observing in the background. It was supplied during the events of an annual Life Day celebration on Kashyyyk.

Life Day 2009, as the title implies, was given out to players during the 2009 festivities of Life Day. It can be purchased with 50 Rebel tokens or Imperial tokens, or it can be randomly given as a gift under the Life Day Tree.
